title: West China Cement Seeks to Acquire South Africa’s AfriSam
description: West China Cement Ltd. is seeking to acquire South Africa’s AfriSam South Africa Proprietary Ltd., marking the latest push by cement companies from the Asian nation to expand on the continent.
content: West China Cement Ltd. is seeking to acquire South Africa’s AfriSam South Africa Proprietary Ltd., marking the latest push by cement companies from the Asian nation to expand on the continent.
